name: Boy named Kind
description:
Boy Named Kind is a simple 2D platformer game.

The game is about a boy named Kind who has no friend at the beginning. After seeing a bunch of people with their friends, he realized he doesn't have any. So, he went through an adventure. In his journey, he met some people and they became his companion. Unfortunately, he didn't know what will came after.

Concept:

This game is a simple adventure game that makes you to follow the path to the end. In the game, you should carefully step on the platforms, avoid the zombies and save all the people. There are 3 levels within the game that you should pass. In each game, you should save a person and reach the house as the finish point. But if you play it carefully, you will figure out that it was more than just a 3-level game.

How to play:

- Right arrow: Move right

- Left arrow: Move left

- Up arrow: Jump

- Escape: Pause

- Hold Shift: Run/jump higher

- Enter: Action

Assets:

- https://craftpix.net/
